item.title: 1-Deploy
item.description: 1. Deploy plgd Cloud There are multiple options how to start using / testing the plgd Cloud. If you’re just trying to get in touch with this Cloud Native IoT framework, jump right to the [try.plgd.cloud](#Try plgd.cloud) instance and onboard your device right away. In case you want to get in touch with the system localy and you have the Docker installed, use our plgd cloud #Bundle. ::: tip Join us!
